reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan lightweight and perfect for summer wear, with a t-shirt type material and generous amount of fabric. The garment is comfortable, soft, and comes in various colors, with one customer noting it pairs well with black, white, or red. They appreciate its fit, with one mentioning it goes to their knuckles, and find it visually appealing, with one highlighting its cute uneven hem.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect accent to any outfit
items.body: This Veryoung Women‚Äôs Lightweight Floral Knit Cardigan is the perfect accent to any outfit! It‚Äôs soft, comfortable, and just the right weight for layering without feeling bulky. The floral design adds a beautiful touch that instantly elevates even the simplest outfit. I love how versatile it is‚Äîgreat with jeans, dresses, or workwear. The fit is flattering, the sleeves are comfortable, and it drapes nicely. I‚Äôve received several compliments every time I wear it. If you‚Äôre looking for a stylish, lightweight cardigan to complete your look, this one is a must-have! Read more
items.author: Rosalyn Sheree Hardrick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight cardigan at a great price
items.body: I really like these cardigans--I bought 8 different colors! They are just the right weight for cooler days here in Southern California. The sleeves are just right, not to tight and not too loose--but they are long on me so I just roll them up a bit and they look great. I had to return the red one because it wasn't a true red (as it looks in the picture). It was an orangy-red. I am short but the length isn't a problem. I have washed them, put them in the drier for a few minutes, and then hang them on a hanger to finish drying. I don't have to touch them up with an iron--a great feature! I can really recommend these for sure! Read more
items.author: Lois S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this cardigan! Lightweight and great for layering!
items.body: Light Weight - Free flowing - Has pockets - Longer than most - Have in several colors Read more
items.author: Heatherlea HB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater/jacket but color is not pure white
items.body: This has soft fabric, great fit and style. The fabric however has a blue-grey cast. It‚Äôs not a pure white or cream -white. Color was a bit disappointing for that reason. Otherwise a great lightweight sweater/jacket. Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent,perfect
items.body: Well made washes and dries well No pilling 3x does shrink a little fits perfectly 5'4" 235lb Very top heavy and midsection...have lost a significant amount of weight, narrow backside hips legs and back ,shopping online is hard for me so is shopping in general to find clothes that fit right, this cardigan is a find, grey purple- gorgeous color Black and wine- classic wine color they have slimming effect bouncy stretchy but fitting material fits were needs to and sways were it needs too love it will be buying other colors this cardigan truly is a find Read more
items.author: peddles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute little vest
items.body: light weight, true to size. vey nice addition to a long sleeve shirt or light weight sweater. Read more
items.author: Diane Castle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soo soft and comfortable!
items.body: I already love this! It fits really nicely - true to size. The material is soo soft! AND it has pockets! My favorite perk in a cardigan! Multi functional, can be dressed up or dressed down. Looks more flattering on than I expected. Really nice. Good deal for what you‚Äôre getting Read more
items.author: ShopperSS

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color and pockets completely inaccurate
items.body: The item fits size wise as expected. There is no smell. The material thickness is as described, and the quality seems ok. Wrinkle resistance, it looks wrinkly out of the bag. I don't care because I am not sure how much I will wear it out of the house. It would be nice to be more wrinkle resistant but that is not something i thought of when I bought it. The color is completely inaccurate. It is a very dark gray not light as the photo. The pockets are completely inaccurate as well. They are little slivers. Since the pockets are almost useless unless you want to stick a tissue in it you aren't afraid of falling out, and the color was not at all what I ordered, 3 stars. I might order another honestly after I try wearing it a while. The thickness is very t-shirt or thinner. It arrived in a teenie tiny bag, too, so I could completely see someone being able to stuff this in a mid-size purse if needed. Therefore, I think these would be good for travel and particularly flying on a plane when temperature changes rapidly even in summer, but you want to cover your arms or are prone to sensitivity to temp changes. So all in all, I may try again. I do think it is a bit overpriced, from first look, but I will have to see how much this becomes part of my day to day summer uniform or not. I like it mostly, so far. Read more
items.author: üèñÔ∏èBeach Berriesüçí

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A02-dark_grey, C14-mauve-sleeveless, C07-red-sleeveless, D03-floral_round_blue-sleeveless, A09-purple, C10-wine Red-sleeveless, B05-floral_off_white, A08-purple_grey, A20-nile_blue, C16-orange-sleeveless, C11-royal Blue-sleeveless, A10-light Apricot, C05-purple-sleeveless, C17-pink-sleeveless. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
